sect1.title: Zym_Version
sect1.para: The class constant Zym_Version::VERSION contains a string that identifies the current version number of Zym Framework. For example, "0.9.0beta".

The static method Zym_Version::compareVersion($version) is based on the PHP function version_compare(). The method returns -1 if the specified $version is older than the Zym Framework version, 0 if they are the same, and +1 if the specified $version is newer than the Zym Framework version.
